snippet: A year after making their first N.C.A.A. tournament appearance since 2002, the Red Storm were eliminated on the first day of the Big East tournament.
lead_paragraph: A year after making their first N.C.A.A. tournament appearance since 2002, the Red Storm were eliminated on the first day of the Big East tournament.

headline.seo: St. John’s Struggles Don’t End With Regular Season
headline.main: St. John’s Struggles Don’t End With Regular Season
headline.print_headline: St. John’s Struggles Don’t End With Regular Season
